DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the impact of playing wind instruments for the development of ocular hypertension and glaucoma, together with investigating the prevalence of visual problems and eye diseases in (professional) musicians.
DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors for Glaucoma in Musicians
DOC.criteria: All full time or part time professional players of participating symphony or wind orchestras, including guest players. Retired players, if possible. Difficulty in reading or speaking Dutch.
